name: Enemy Health Tower Regen
description: Increases tower regeneration based on enemy health

calculation_formulas.final_regen: Base Health Regen × (1 + Perk Bonus) × (1 + Card Bonus) × (1 + Relic Bonus)

context_fields.when_to_use: Excellent for sustained survival against high-health enemies
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Medium priority for Standard Perk Bonus lab research
synergy_combinations: Max Health for larger health pool to regenerate
Standard Perk Bonus lab research for maximum effect
counter_strategies: Essential against high-health enemies and sustained damage
Scales multiplicatively with other health regen bonuses
Combines with health perks for maximum survivability
context_fields.formula: Total Bonus = (1 + Base Value x Quantity) x (1 + Standard Perk Bonus)

notes: Standard perk bonuses can be increased using the Standard Perk Bonus lab
